text: Rodrigues (French: Île Rodrigues; Creole: Rodrig) is an island in the Indian Ocean. It belongs to the Mascarene Islands and is part of the Republic of Mauritius. Its size is 108 km². About 42,000 people were living on this island in 2014. Main town is Port Mathurin. == References == * Tourist information Category:Islands of Africa Category:Geography of Mauritius
title: Rodrigues
